bill.title: Courts omnibus bill: public safety.
bill.description: An act to amend Section 6322.1 of the Business and Professions Code, to amend Sections 68086.1, 69926, 69927, 69957, 70602, 70603, 70611, 70612, 70613, 70614, 70621, 70626, 70650, 70651, 70652, 70653, 70654, 70655, 70656, 70658, and 70670 of, to add Sections 68106.2, 68511.9, and 77202.5 to, and to add and repeal Sections 68106 and 68106.1 of, the Government Code, to amend Section 103470 of the Health and Safety Code, to amend Section 5023.5 of, and to amend, repeal, and add Section 1465.8 of, the Penal Code, to amend Section 7660 of the Probate Code, and to amend Sections 1955 and 1961 of the Welfare and Institutions Code, relating to courts, and declaring the urgency thereof, to take effect immediately.

history.action: From printer. Without reference to committee. Ordered to second reading. Read second time. To third reading.
Read third time, passed, and to Senate. (Ayes 47. Noes 2. Page 27.)
In Senate. Read first time. To Com. on RLS. for assignment.
Withdrawn from committee. Ordered placed on second reading file. Read second time. To third reading.

Read third time and amended. Joint Rule 10.5 suspended. (Ayes 37. Noes 1. Page 43.) Senate Rule 29.3 suspended. (Ayes 24. Noes 12. Page 43.) Read third time. Urgency clause adopted. Passed and to Assembly. (Ayes 30. Noes 7. Page 55.)
In Assembly. Concurrence in Senate amendments pending.

votes.desc: AB 13 EVANS  Assembly Third Reading  Fourth Extraordinary Session
Assembly 3rd Reading AB13 Evans Urgency Clause
